devdoc.details: This contract manages stable swap functionality, including executing swaps and caculating swap amounts

params.amountIn: Amount of the input token to be exchanged.
params.amountOutMin: Minimum expected amount of output tokens.
params.flag: Flag indicating the pool type. Use '2' for a 2-pool, '3' for a 3-pool.
params.path: Array of token addresses in a stable swap pool.
params.to: Recipient address to receive the exchanged tokens.

params.amountInMax: Maximum expected amount of output tokens.
params.flag: Flag indicating the pool type. Use '2' for a 2-pool, '3' for a 3-pool.
params.path: Array of token addresses in a stable swap pool.

params.amountOutMin: Minimum expected amount of output tokens.
params.flag: Flag indicating the pool type. Use '2' for a 2-pool, '3' for a 3-pool.
params.path: Array of token addresses in a stable swap pool.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Stable Swap Router

setStableSwap(address,address).notice: Set Stable Swap Factory and Info

userdoc.notice: A router contract for excuting stable swaps between different stablecoins pairs through mutiple pools         It allows users to swap stable coins efficiently
